org.jetel.mapping.filter

Class MappingFilterAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.mapping.filter.MappingFilterAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MappingFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SourceCloverMappingFilter, SourceErrorMappingFilter, TargetCloverMappingFilter, TargetPortMappingFilter

    public class MappingFilterAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MappingFilter
    A adapter implementation of MappingFilter interface. This filter keeps all mapping assignments in the filtered mapping.
